properties.name: Pinnacle Trail (orange) to Pond Trail (red)
properties.description: Take your time on the Great Stone Stairs of the Pond Trail! Turn left after the stairs.

properties.name: Pinnacle Boardwalk
properties.description: After the Pinnacle Boardwalk, turn right onto The Shortcut trail (green) to head toward the summit.

properties.name: Summit
properties.description: Nice view of downtown — the halfway point of your trek!

properties.name: Waypoint
properties.description: Cross the road to the old ski slope (now a sledding hill), then follow the walkway down, not the road.

properties.name: La cocina de Vicky
properties.description: Refuel at Vicky's Mexican food truck (https://www.facebook.com/tucosina1/). Port-a-potty available - ask Vicky for the combination.

properties.name: McCormick's Restaurant at Triggs
properties.description: Triggs is a city-owned golf course. Stop into the on-site restaurant for a bite, a drink, or to use the restrooms.
